PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13212022-12-15TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation Information Regulations (Freight Rail Data)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION INFORMATION REGULATIONS (FREIGHT RAIL DATA) in order to (1) set reporting requirements for six named rail carriers on service and performance indicators, waybill information, and traffic information; and (2) differentiate information requirements based on the size and scope of the rail carrier.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0278 Publication Date: 2023-01-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Transportation Information Regulations (Freight Rail Data)
precis: Regulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION INFORMATION REGULATIONS (FREIGHT RAIL DATA) in order to (1) set reporting requirements for six named rail carriers on service and performance indicators, waybill information, and traffic information; and (2) differentiate information requirements based on the size and scope of the rail carrier.
